message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.DS, cs.ST

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG) because it proposes a new surrogate loss for optimizing the area under ROC (AUC) metric, which is an important metric for binary classification problems. Additionally, the paper discusses both online and batch algorithms for AUC optimization, which are common topics in machine learning research. 

The paper may also be relevant to the sub-category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) because AUC is a commonly used metric in many AI applications, such as fraud detection and medical diagnosis. 

The sub-category of computer vision (cs.CV) is also a possibility because AUC is often used to evaluate the performance of image classification models. 

The sub-category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) is relevant because the paper discusses the computational complexity of the proposed algorithm. 

Finally, the sub-category of statistics (cs.ST) may also be relevant because AUC is a statistical measure of the performance of a binary classifier.
